name: MetaFilter unicorn + narwhal buttons + laser kitty
description: Shows unicorn and narwhal buttons on the comment form, and a laser kitty on deleted posts (for logged-in members). Based on user script originally created by Rhomboid; updated to support Modern theme.

user.name: rf14
user.about: The MeFi styles here are based on the user scripts I posted on GreasyFork (and before that, Userscripts.org). I made these for folks who can't install user scripts, but can install user styles for the Stylish extension. If you'd rather use scripts with Greasemonkey or Tampermonkey, visit my GreasyFork page: https://greasyfork.org/en/users/2049-rf14 If you've already installed the user scripts and are wondering what the difference is: there's really none. If you're happy with how the scripts work for you, there's no need to switch to user styles. I did these for fun and to share with other MeFites for personal use. If you like any of these user styles or scripts, please consider donating directly to MetaFilter. If you run into an issue with any user styles I've posted, send MeFi mail to me or message me here (I'm not sure if I'll get notifications for comments in the Feedback section). I'll try to answer when I get a chance. If it turns out to be a fix that requires a lot of research/testing (I'm not a programmer), then it'll probably have to happen when I get extended free time (e.g. a holiday). - rangefinder 1.4

additional_info: This user style is based on the Greasemonkey/Tampermonkey user script similar in name (the whole name wouldn't fit here on the userstyles.org form): "MetaFilter unicorn and narwhal buttons with laser kitty (Modern)". They both accomplish the same thing. I made this for people who can't install user scripts, but can install user styles. More details/history on the script page: https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/7265-metafilter-unicorn-and-narwhal-buttons-with-laser-kitty Version 3.1: This is actually the first public release of the user style. The versioning starts at 3.1, to match the version of the user script on which it's based) As of 2016-08-21: Tested to be working in Firefox and Chrome. Should work for all official MeFi themes (Modern, Modern Dark, Classic, Plain). Credits This is an update of the awesome script created by Rhomboid, and is shared with his permission. His related archived scripts on userscripts-mirror.org: * Unicorn and narwhal with laser kitty * Unicorn and narwhal (no laser kitty) * Unicorn only The images are from Rhomboid's original scripts: * Narwhal by cubecrazy2: http://cubecrazy2.deviantart.com/ (the original link is 404: http://cubecrazy2.deviantart.com/The-Great-Narwhal-15457455) * Unicorn and laser kitty source unknown.
